doc:
Aviva Baumann https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aviva_Baumann 0 Aviva Baumann (née Farber; born July 10, 1984) is an American actress known best for her role as Nicola in the hit Judd Apatow and Seth Rogen comedy, Superbad; as young Shannon Gibbs, the first wife of Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs, in flashbacks on the US TV drama NCIS; and as Mandy, the much younger girlfriend of Ken Marino on Party Down. She married actor Ken Baumann on June 16, 2012. Aviva_Baumann ( née_Farber ; born July_10_,_1984 ) is an_American_actress known best for her_role as Nicola in the_hit_Judd_Apatow and Seth_Rogen_comedy , Superbad ; as young_Shannon_Gibbs , the_first_wife of Special_Agent_Leroy_Jethro_Gibbs , in flashbacks on the_US_TV_drama_NCIS ; and as Mandy , the_much_younger_girlfriend of Ken_Marino on Party_Down . She married actor_Ken_Baumann on June_16_,_2012 .
